title: Influence of contouring the lithium metal/solid electrolyte interface on the critical current for dendrites
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1448-1456
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03322H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shengming Zhang, Bingkun Hu, Zeyang Geng, Xiangwen Gao, Dominic Spencer-Jolly, Dominic L.R. Melvin, Ziyang Ning, Guanchen Li, Max Jenkins, Longlong Wang, Hui Gao, Shengda D. Pu, T. James Marrow, Charles W. Monroe, Peter G. Bruce
Efforts to avoid dendrites by increasing the interfacial surface area to lower local current densities are limited by significant local pressure accumulation associated with the topography of any surface contouring.
